item.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them Ending Explained
item.description: The ending of Fantastic Beasts raises several questions about the future of the franchise whilst introducing several new and exciting concepts.

item.title: Ultraman: Rising Was "One Of The Hardest Things" Composer Scot Stafford Ever Worked On
item.description: Scot Stafford, the composer behind Ultraman: Rising, discusses crafting the film's eclectic soundtrack and building an authentic creative team.

item.title: Winona Ryderâ€™s Beetlejuice 2 Return Ironically Fulfills 1 Original Movie Plan That Tim Burton Rejected 36 Years Ago
item.description: Lydia Deetz's Ghost House TV show in Beetlejuice Beetlejuice is a not-so-subtle nod to an idea Tim Burton fought against in the 1988 original.
